mul_compl_self:

theorem mul_compl_self {P : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }} : (↑P : M) * ↑(«expr ᶜ» P) = 0 := by
  rw [coe_compl, mul_sub, mul_one, P.prop.proj.eq, sub_self]
#align mul_compl_self mul_compl_self

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem mul [FaithfulSMul M X] {P Q : M} (h₁ : is_Lprojection X P) (h₂ : is_Lprojection X Q) :
    is_Lprojection X (P * Q) :=
  by
  refine' ⟨IsIdempotentElem.mul_of_commute (h₁.commute h₂) h₁.proj h₂.proj, _⟩
  intro x
  refine' le_antisymm _ _
  ·
    calc
      «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (P * Q) x + (x - «expr • » (P * Q) x)) := by
        rw [add_sub_cancel'_right («expr • » (P * Q) x) x]
      _ ≤ «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (P * Q) x) + «expr‖ ‖» (x - «expr • » (P * Q) x) := by apply norm_add_le
      _ = «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (P * Q) x) + «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - P * Q) x) := by rw [sub_smul, one_smul]
      
  ·
    calc
      «expr‖ ‖» x =
          «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » P («expr • » Q x)) +
            («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » Q x - «expr • » P («expr • » Q x)) + «expr‖ ‖» (x - «expr • » Q x)) :=
        by rw [h₂.Lnorm x, h₁.Lnorm («expr • » Q x), sub_smul, one_smul, sub_smul, one_smul, add_assoc]
      _ ≥
          «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » P («expr • » Q x)) +
            «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » Q x - «expr • » P («expr • » Q x) + (x - «expr • » Q x)) :=
        (add_le_add_iff_left («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » P («expr • » Q x)))).mpr
          (norm_add_le («expr • » Q x - «expr • » P («expr • » Q x)) (x - «expr • » Q x))
      _ = «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (P * Q) x) + «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - P * Q) x) := by
        rw [sub_add_sub_cancel', sub_smul, one_smul, mul_smul]
      
#align mul mul
le_def:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
theorem le_def [FaithfulSMul M X] (P Q : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) : P ≤ Q ↔ (P : M) = ↑(«expr ⊓ » P Q) :=
  iff.rfl
#align le_def le_def
join:
theorem join [FaithfulSMul M X] {P Q : M} (h₁ : is_Lprojection X P) (h₂ : is_Lprojection X Q) :
    is_Lprojection X (P + Q - P * Q) :=
  by
  convert (Lcomplement_iff _).mp (h₁.Lcomplement.mul h₂.Lcomplement) using 1
  noncomm_ring
#align join join
distrib_lattice_lemma:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
theorem distrib_lattice_lemma [FaithfulSMul M X] {P Q R : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }} :
    ((↑P : M) + ↑(«expr ᶜ» P) * R) * (↑P + ↑Q * ↑R * ↑(«expr ᶜ» P)) = ↑P + ↑Q * ↑R * ↑(«expr ᶜ» P) := by
  rw [add_mul, mul_add, mul_add, mul_assoc (↑(«expr ᶜ» P)) (↑R) (↑Q * ↑R * ↑(«expr ᶜ» P)), ←
    mul_assoc (↑R) (↑Q * ↑R) ↑(«expr ᶜ» P), ← coe_inf Q, ((«expr ᶜ» P).prop.commute R.prop).eq,
    ((«expr ⊓ » Q R).prop.commute («expr ᶜ» P).prop).eq, (R.prop.commute («expr ⊓ » Q R).prop).eq, coe_inf Q,
    mul_assoc ↑Q, ← mul_assoc, mul_assoc ↑R, ((«expr ᶜ» P).prop.commute P.prop).eq, mul_compl_self, zero_mul, mul_zero,
    zero_add, add_zero, ← mul_assoc, P.prop.proj.eq, R.prop.proj.eq, ← coe_inf Q, mul_assoc,
    ((«expr ⊓ » Q R).prop.commute («expr ᶜ» P).prop).eq, ← mul_assoc, («expr ᶜ» P).prop.proj.eq]
#align distrib_lattice_lemma distrib_lattice_lemma
compl_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
theorem compl_mul {P : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }} {Q : M} : ↑(«expr ᶜ» P) * Q = Q - ↑P * Q := by
  rw [coe_compl, sub_mul, one_mul]
#align compl_mul compl_mul
coe_zero:
@[simp]
theorem coe_zero : ↑(0 : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) = (0 : M) :=
  rfl
#align coe_zero coe_zero
coe_top:
@[simp]
theorem coe_top [FaithfulSMul M X] : ↑(bounded_order.top : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) = (1 : M) :=
  rfl
#align coe_top coe_top
coe_sup:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_sup [FaithfulSMul M X] (P Q : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) :
    ↑(«expr ⊔ » P Q) = (↑P : M) + ↑Q - ↑P * ↑Q :=
  rfl
#align coe_sup coe_sup
coe_sdiff:
@[simp]
theorem coe_sdiff [FaithfulSMul M X] (P Q : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) : ↑(P \ Q) = (↑P : M) * (1 - ↑Q) :=
  rfl
#align coe_sdiff coe_sdiff
coe_one:
@[simp]
theorem coe_one : ↑(1 : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) = (1 : M) :=

coe_inf:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_inf [FaithfulSMul M X] (P Q : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) : ↑(«expr ⊓ » P Q) = (↑P : M) * ↑Q :=
  rfl
#align coe_inf coe_inf
coe_compl:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_compl (P : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) : ↑(«expr ᶜ» P) = (1 : M) - ↑P :=
  rfl
#align coe_compl coe_compl
coe_bot:
@[simp]
theorem coe_bot [FaithfulSMul M X] : ↑(bounded_order.bot : { P : M // is_Lprojection X P }) = (0 : M) :=
  rfl
#align coe_bot coe_bot
Lcomplement_iff:
theorem Lcomplement_iff (P : M) : is_Lprojection X P ↔ is_Lprojection X (1 - P) :=
  ⟨Lcomplement, fun h => sub_sub_cancel 1 P ▸ h.Lcomplement⟩
#align Lcomplement_iff Lcomplement_iff
Lcomplement:
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Christopher Hoskin. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Christopher Hoskin
-/
theorem Lcomplement {P : M} (h : is_Lprojection X P) : is_Lprojection X (1 - P) :=
  ⟨h.proj.one_sub, fun x => by
    rw [add_comm, sub_sub_cancel]
    exact h.Lnorm x⟩
#align Lcomplement Lcomplement

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
#print Commute /-
theorem Commute [FaithfulSMul M X] {P Q : M} (h₁ : is_Lprojection X P) (h₂ : is_Lprojection X Q) : Commute P Q :=
  by
  have PR_eq_RPR : ∀ R : M, is_Lprojection X R → P * R = R * P * R := fun R h₃ =>
    by
    refine' @eq_of_smul_eq_smul _ X _ _ _ _ fun x => _
    rw [← norm_sub_eq_zero_iff]
    have e1 :
      «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R x) ≥
        «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R x) + «expr • » 2 («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (P * R) x - «expr • » (R * P * R) x)) :=
      calc
        «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R x) =
            «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
                «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - R) («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
              («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (R * R) x - «expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
                «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - R) («expr • » (1 - P) («expr • » R x)))) :=
          by
          rw [h₁.Lnorm, h₃.Lnorm, h₃.Lnorm («expr • » (1 - P) («expr • » R x)), sub_smul 1 P, one_smul, smul_sub,
            mul_smul]
        _ =
            «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
                «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - R) («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
              («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R x - «expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
                «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » ((1 - R) * R) x - «expr • » (1 - R) («expr • » P («expr • » R x)))) :=
          by rw [h₃.proj.eq, sub_smul 1 P, one_smul, smul_sub, mul_smul]
        _ =
            «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
                «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - R) («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
              («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R x - «expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
                «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - R) («expr • » P («expr • » R x)))) :=
          by rw [sub_mul, h₃.proj.eq, one_mul, sub_self, zero_smul, zero_sub, norm_neg]
        _ =
            «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
                «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R x - «expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))) +
              «expr • » 2 («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - R) («expr • » P («expr • » R x)))) :=
          by abel
        _ ≥ «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R x) + «expr • » 2 («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (P * R) x - «expr • » (R * P * R) x)) :=
          by
          rw [GE.ge]
          have :=
            add_le_add_right (norm_le_insert' («expr • » R x) («expr • » R («expr • » P («expr • » R x))))
              («expr • » 2 («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (1 - R) («expr • » P («expr • » R x)))))
          simpa only [mul_smul, sub_smul, one_smul] using this
        
    rw [GE.ge] at e1
    nth_rw_rhs 1 [← add_zero («expr‖ ‖» («expr • » R x))]  at e1
    rw [add_le_add_iff_left, two_smul, ← two_mul] at e1
    rw [le_antisymm_iff]
    refine' ⟨_, norm_nonneg _⟩
    rwa [← mul_zero (2 : exprℝ), mul_le_mul_left (show (0 : exprℝ) < 2 by norm_num)] at e1
  have QP_eq_QPQ : Q * P = Q * P * Q :=
    by
    have e1 : P * (1 - Q) = P * (1 - Q) - (Q * P - Q * P * Q) :=
      calc
        P * (1 - Q) = (1 - Q) * P * (1 - Q) := by rw [PR_eq_RPR (1 - Q) h₂.Lcomplement]
        _ = P * (1 - Q) - (Q * P - Q * P * Q) := by noncomm_ring
        
    rwa [eq_sub_iff_add_eq, add_right_eq_self, sub_eq_zero] at e1
  show P * Q = Q * P
  · rw [QP_eq_QPQ, PR_eq_RPR Q h₂]
#align commute Commute
-/
